company.name: Southaven Internal Medicine
company.description: Southaven Internal Medicine has been committed to providing our patients with the highest level of care in a friendly and comfortable environment. Our goal is to make our patients feel like they are family, focusing on preventative medicine, health screenings, and helping our community find solutions to the health challenges they face.

hero.headline: Dedicated to our patients since 1996
hero.subheadline: Southaven Internal Medicine provides the highest level of care in a friendly and comfortable environment. Our board certified physicians focus on preventative medicine and helping our community achieve the best possible state of health and well being.

about.headline: About Us
about.content: Southaven Internal Medicine has been committed to providing our patients with the highest level of care in a friendly and comfortable environment since 1996. Our goal is to make our patients feel like they are family. As a practice, we focus on preventative medicine, health screenings, and helping our community find solutions to the health challenges they face.

services.headline: Our Services
services.description: We provide comprehensive internal medicine services including preventative care, health screenings, telehealth appointments, patient portal access, and on-site laboratory services through American Esoteric Laboratories.

team.headline: Meet Our Providers
team.description: Our board certified physicians, Dr. Magdi Wassef and Dr. Mary Missak, have over 30 years of experience each in internal medicine and are dedicated to providing exceptional care to our patients.

contact.headline: Contact Us
contact.description: Ready to experience personalized healthcare? Contact us today to schedule your appointment or learn more about our services.

footer.copyright: Â© 2024 Southaven Internal Medicine. All rights reserved.

seo.title: Southaven Internal Medicine - Quality Healthcare Since 1996
seo.description: Southaven Internal Medicine provides comprehensive internal medicine services in Southaven, MS. Board certified physicians offering preventative care, health screenings, and telehealth options.
